subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Frans Nielsen scored 16 seconds into the second period to break a 3-3 tie, and the Islanders held on to beat Detroit, 5-4, for their first home win this month.
snippet: Frans Nielsen scored 16 seconds into the second period to break a 3-3 tie, and the Islanders held on to beat Detroit, 5-4, for their first home win this month.
